name: @Firebug - Compact Tabs
description:
Firebug have many third-party plug-ins like CodeBurner, Firefinder, Inline Code Finder, Page Speed, SenSEO, YSlow...But, their tabs use so wide space in the narrow browser width so that some of these are missing sometimes...


This style sheet makes
  1. Font smaller
  2. Eliminate redundant tab spaces
for better appearance.

**** Your feedback is always welcome ****
additional_info:
========== Change Log ==========
Sep 24, 2013: Added a comment to meet global styles criteria by Stylish described at https://github.com/JasonBarnabe/stylish/wiki/Preventing-global-styles
Apr 10, 2011: Adjusted for current FF4 and Firebug.
Sep 29, 2009: Reduce doubled down-arrow marks next to the current tab.
Aug 23, 2009: Adjust side margin of each tab.
